direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods attempt to remove elements from the bag but handle different counts.
Both methods remove elements from the bag, but removeAll handles a collection of elements.
Both methods modify the contents of the bag, but retainAll retains only the specified elements.
Both methods remove elements based on a condition, but removeIf uses a predicate.

enhanced_by.reason: The unmodifiableBag method initializes the bag, which is a prerequisite for the remove method.
The iterator method is often used before or after modifying the bag, including the remove method.
The uniqueSet method can be used to verify the state of the bag after removal operations.
